code: @Test public void testReuseConnection() throws Exception {     for (int i = 0. i < 20. i++) {         String out = template.requestBody(uri, "" + i, String.class).         assertEquals("Reply " + i, out).     } }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from(uri).transform().simple("Reply ${body}"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from(uri).transform().simple("Reply ${body}").         }     }. }
